articles.title: Mystery Asteroid To Pass Earth Before Christmas. All You Need To Know - NDTV
articles.description: According to the European Space Agency (ESA), this holiday season you may very well be able to spot an asteroid not larger than the Statue of Liberty, that is travelling towards the Earth.
articles.content:
Distance between the asteroid and Earth will be under two lunar distances. (Representational)
